title: Redesign Services Section with Premium Service Cards

requirements.text: Restructure the Services section on the homepage with a centered heading 'Our Services' followed by a short 1-line supporting text below it

quotes: Section Heading (Centered) Our Services Short 1-line supporting text below it.

acceptanceCriteria: Services section has centered 'Our Services' heading
A descriptive 1-line subtitle appears below the heading
Heading and subtitle maintain proper spacing hierarchy

requirements.text: Replace existing small icon boxes with large premium service cards, where each card displays: service title (bold, prominent), 2-3 line meaningful description, primary CTA button (Book Appointment / Learn More), optional small icon above title, and proper padding and spacing

quotes: Display large premium service cards, not small icon boxes.

Each Service Card Must Include: Service Title (Bold, prominent) 2–3 line meaningful description Primary CTA Button (Book Appointment / Learn More) Optional small icon above title Proper padding and spacing

acceptanceCriteria: Each service is displayed as a large rectangular card
Service title is bold and prominently displayed
Each card includes a 2-3 line description with softer text color
Each card has a primary CTA button with relevant text (Book Now, Schedule Consultation, or Learn More)
Optional icon appears above the title when appropriate
Cards have generous internal padding and spacing

requirements.text: Style service cards with rounded corners (16-20px border radius), soft shadow depth, light background or subtle section contrast, clean premium spacing, and typography hierarchy with large bold titles, softer colored descriptions, and clearly visible CTAs

quotes: Large rectangular cards Rounded corners (16–20px) Soft shadow depth Light background (or subtle section contrast) Clean premium spacing Typography hierarchy: Title large & bold Description softer color CTA clearly visible

acceptanceCriteria: Cards have 16-20px rounded corners
Cards have soft shadow depth for premium feel
Cards use light backgrounds with subtle contrast
Typography follows clear hierarchy with large bold titles and softer descriptions
CTA buttons are prominently visible and styled

requirements.text: Implement desktop layout with 2 service cards per row in a spacious grid with equal height cards, and add hover effects including slight lift, shadow increase, and CTA button highlight

quotes: Desktop Layout 2 cards per row Spacious grid Equal height cards Hover effect: Slight lift Shadow increase CTA button highlight

acceptanceCriteria: Desktop displays exactly 2 cards per row
Grid layout is spacious with appropriate gaps
All cards in the same row have equal height
On hover, cards lift slightly upward
On hover, card shadow increases in depth
On hover, CTA button shows highlight effect

requirements.text: Implement mobile layout with single column stacked cards at full width, large touch-friendly CTA buttons, and clean vertical spacing

quotes: Mobile Layout Single column stacked cards Full width Large touch-friendly CTA buttons Clean vertical spacing

acceptanceCriteria: Mobile view displays cards in single column
Cards span full width on mobile
CTA buttons are large and touch-friendly (minimum 44px height)
Vertical spacing between cards is clean and consistent

requirements.text: Add micro interactions including smooth scroll reveal animation for service cards, hover lift animation, button subtle glow effect, and 0.3s smooth transitions throughout

quotes: Micro Interactions Smooth scroll reveal animation Hover lift animation Button subtle glow effect 0.3s smooth transitions

acceptanceCriteria: Service cards animate into view on scroll
Cards have smooth lift animation on hover
CTA buttons show subtle glow effect on hover
All transitions use 0.3s duration for smooth feel

requirements.text: Style CTA buttons with rounded pill design, brand color background, subtle hover scale effect, and optional clean icon

quotes: Primary CTA: Rounded pill style Brand color background Subtle hover scale Clean icon (optional)

acceptanceCriteria: CTA buttons have rounded pill shape (high border radius)
Buttons use existing brand colors as background
Buttons scale slightly on hover
Optional icons can be included in buttons when appropriate

constraints: Do NOT change overall website layout structure
Only improve the visual structure and presentation of the Services section
Maintain the modern dental/healthcare website aesthetic already established
nonGoals: Modifying other sections of the homepage beyond Services
Changing backend functionality or data structure
